Package com.example.mborper.breathbetter.bluetooth

Class BeaconListeningService

java.lang.Object
android.content.Context
android.content.ContextWrapper
android.app.Service
com.example.mborper.breathbetter.bluetooth.BeaconListeningService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
public class BeaconListeningService extends android.app.Service
BeaconListeningService is an Android Service that scans for Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) devices using BluetoothLeScanner. It operates in the background as a foreground service and continuously scans for devices based on a provided target UUID. When a matching device is found, it generates a Measurement object.
Author:
Manuel Borregales

      public int onStartCommand(android.content.Intent intent, int flags, int startId)
      Called when the service is started with a start command. It receives the target device UUID to scan for.

      Intent Natural: flags ---> onStartCommand() ---> Natural Natural: startId

      Overrides:
      onStartCommand in class android.app.Service

      intent - The intent that starts the service.
      flags - Additional flags about the start request.
      startId - A unique identifier for this specific start request.
      Returns:
      Integer indicating how the system should handle the service if it is killed.

      private void initializeHandlerThread()

      private void initializeBluetooth()

      private void performWork()
      Continuously performs BLE device scans while the service is running.

    • searchBTLEDevices

      private void searchBTLEDevices()
      Starts scanning for Bluetooth devices and sends the result to processScanResult()

    • processScanResult

      private void processScanResult(android.bluetooth.le.ScanResult result, String target)
      Processes the result of a BLE device scan. If a device with the matching UUID obtained in onStartCommand() is found, a new Measurement is created.

      ScanResult:result ---> processScanResult()

      Parameters:
      result - The result of the BLE scan containing device information.

    • stopBTLEDeviceSearch

      private void stopBTLEDeviceSearch()
      Stops the BLE device search by stopping the BLE scan.

      public void onDestroy()
      Called when the service is destroyed. Cleans up resources such as stopping the scan and terminating the handler thread.
